USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.payment_type') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
    WITH (
        data_source = nyc_taxi_src,
        location = 'silver/payment_type',
        file_format = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT  payment_type, description
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json', DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
               FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',  FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b', FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    )
    GO

SELECT * FROM silver.payment_type;
